doc.title: Life in 2 Dimensions
doc.plot: Bala and Zoots live in a two dimensional world. Bala is a roundish sweet-potato shape on stick legs, and Zoots is a cat. They go for a walk to see the sunset. Bala, who speaks English, proclaims the sun a perfect circle; Zoots, who speaks Me-Yow, says it's a sphere. Bala must consider this challenge to a two-dimensional world view. Can Bala's epistemology add a third dimension? And if so, how far?
